metadata.title: CVE-2022-45886 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9.drivers/media/dvb-core/dvb_net.c has a .disconnect versus dvb_device_openrace condition that leads to a use-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45886` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-83-generic - 5.15.0-83.92
linux-image-5.15.0-83-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-83.92
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-83-generic - 5.15.0-83.92
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-83-generic-64k - 5.15.0-83.92
No subscription required
